title: Teen shot as he ran across path of another teen target shooting
content:
TURTLECREEK TOWNSHIP, OH (FOX19) -
Warren County sheriff's officials are investigating after one teenager accidentally shot another over the weekend.
Two teenager boys, both 16, were target shooting on Wilmington Road when one of the teens was shot as he ran across the path of the other one, said Lt. Eric Johnson.
The injured teen was airlifted to an unidentified hospital.
No names were released.
FOX19 NOW will update this story as information develops.
